lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump sought to move beyond a week of turmoil, turning his attention to the economy with a speech in which he cast himself as a president who could create new jobs.

byline.original: By NEIL IRWIN and ALAN RAPPEPORT

headline.print_headline: Trump Outlines Economic Agenda and Tax Changes
headline.main: Donald Trump Adopts G.O.P. Tax Cuts, but Balks at Trade Pacts

snippet: Mr. Trump sought to move beyond a week of turmoil, turning his attention to the economy with a speech in which he cast himself as a president who could create new jobs....
abstract: Donald J Trump outlines his economic vision in speech at Detroit Economic Club, vowing to simplify tax system, rethink America’s energy policy and tear up trade agreements in effort to cast himself as creator of new jobs; address comes after week of turmoil over his remarks about Muslim family of fallen American soldier and several other miscues.
